title: Sanjay Manjrekar Shares His Thoughts On Being A Parent Only To Get Mocked Online About His Commentary
text:
Sanjay Manjrekar Shares His Thoughts On Being A Parent Only To Get Mocked Online About His Commentary

Sanjay Manjrekar Shares His Thoughts On Being A Parent Only To Get Mocked Online About His Commentary

Sanjay Manjrekar has never been the most popular commentator when behind the mic. So much so that even when he is refers to something that has nothing to do with his job or the game, people cannot help but troll him.

This time he was was mocked for his commentary after tweeting on "being a parent".

On the occasion of Bhai-Dooj, he tweeted that he overheard his son's talk with the latter's sister.

bccl

This is what he posted:

My son on speaker phone to his sister. “I got a revelation the other day about how dad was wrong.🤨#BeingAParent — Sanjay Manjrekar (@sanjaymanjrekar) October 29, 2019

Within minutes, the internet launched into him and took shots at his commentary and even referred to his tiff with Ravindra Jadeja during the World Cup. Here's what they said:

He might have heard you on the Comm Box — Hariharan Durairaj (@hari_durairaj) October 29, 2019

Don't Miss 15 K SHARES 11.2 K SHARES 7.3 K SHARES 9.4 K SHARES 3.1 K SHARES

Must be about constantly demeaning @imjadeja achievement — #BB13_official (@OfficialBb13) October 29, 2019

Hope he hasn't started listening to your commentary.😛 — My conscience/என் மனசாட்சி (@machanae1) October 29, 2019

Oh “bits and pieces” happened again ? — Manish Goyal (@cacsmango) October 29, 2019

Is this about you referring to @imjadeja as bits and pieces player????? — Average (@lordhoobastank) October 29, 2019

Needless to say, this was a bit of an overreaction from fans as they went a tad overboard.

bccl

Just goes to show that if you are in the bad books it's hard to get out.

With Inputs From ANI.
